title: Comparative gene analysis in unannotated genomes
questions: I have several genomes assemblies that are not annoatated (or I do not trust annotations)
I am interested to compare structure of a particular gene across these genome assemblies
objectives: Provide a quick method for identifying genes of interest in unannotated or newly assembled genomes
key_points: You can locate gene of interest in unannotated genomes and compare its structure across multiple species
